description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nEureka!:
This creature always has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_MANIA} and has additional {STAT_intelligence} equal to 5% of the potency of its {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_MANIA}. This creature cannot be immune to {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_MANIA}.
name: Nacre Crown
